item.description:
Granite State Future (GSF) aka the Sustainable Communities Initiative at the Federal level, is a Federal Partnership between HUD, DOT and the EPA. The GSF is a Consortium of the 9 Regional Planning Commissions (RPC) with the Nashua RPC designated as the lead point of contact with HUD. The grant purpose is to assist in developing a Regional Master plan for all nine regions in the State of NH.

What to expect - http://granitegrok.com/blog/2013/03/governmentoversite-nhlistens-granite-state-future-another-viewpoint

FB event - https://www.facebook.com/events/332420076880113/
item.name: Granite State Future "Listening Session" (Kingston)
